item1:
转储记录数据查询
Query the log of bin to bin transfer
item2:
可查询库位状态及产品明细数据
Can query the status of the location and article details
item5:
库存信息的查询条件
Query conditions for inventory information
输出
item6:
转储记录数据
Bin to bin transfer log data
异常处里
item7:
如果无符合条件的数据，系统将提示查无此库位信息
If there is no eligible log data, the system will prompt you to find no such location information
如果因为网路中断产生的异常，须结束WES软件，请网路管理人员恢复网路后再重启WES
If the WES software needs to be terminated due to an abnormality caused by a network interruption, ask the network administrator to restore the network and restart WES
操作步骤
item8:
1. 输入查询条件后点选Query查询库位数据
Enter query conditions and click Query to query the location data
2. 点选功能菜单Refresh可清除画面上的数据回到初始状态
Click refresh to clear the data on the screen and return to the initial state
3. 点选功能菜单Exit或关闭视窗可结束此作业
Click the function menu exit or close window to end this job
后置条件
item10:
可以查看回报SAP状态
You can view and report SAP status
